title: Desi Pinnia Privacy Policy
text:
At Desi Pinnia, we prioritize the protection of your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your data in compliance with the Personal Information Protection and Electronic Documents Act (PIPEDA) and other applicable Canadian laws.


We collect personal information only for legitimate business purposes. The types of information we may collect include:

Contact Information: Name, address, phone number, email.
Financial Information: Payment details required for billing our services.
Business Information: Details about your business if you’re working with us.
Technical Information: IP addresses, browsing data, cookies, etc., collected while using our website.



We collect personal information with your consent. By providing your information, you agree to its use as outlined in this Privacy Policy.




We use the personal information collected for the following purposes:

Service Delivery: To manage and fulfill our contracts with clients.
Communication: To respond to inquiries and share information about our products and services.
Billing and Payments: To process financial transactions.
Website and Service Improvement: To analyze website usage and improve the user experience.
Legal Compliance: To meet legal and regulatory requirements.

We are committed to using personal information solely for legitimate business purposes and in accordance with applicable laws.



We do not disclose your personal information to third parties without your consent, except in the following cases:

Third-Party Service Providers: We may share information with partners or vendors who help us deliver services (e.g., payment processing, website hosting).
Legal Obligations: We may be required to disclose your personal information if mandated by law or in response to legitimate government requests.
Mergers or Acquisitions: If we undergo a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred to the new entity.

We ensure that all third parties comply with applicable privacy laws and security standards.



We retain personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy or as required by law. Once information is no longer needed, we securely destroy or anonymize it.



We take appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, loss, disclosure, or alteration. These include:

Access Controls: Limiting access to employees and vendors who need the information to perform their duties.
Encryption: Protecting sensitive data during transmission.
Monitoring: Regularly assessing our systems to detect and prevent breaches.

While we take reasonable precautions, no method of transmission or storage is entirely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.



Our website uses cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience. Cookies are small files stored on your device that help us collect information like your IP address and browsing habits.
Types of cookies we use:

Essential Cookies: Necessary for the website’s functionality.
Performance Cookies: To analyze site usage and improve functionality.
Marketing Cookies: To provide personalized content and advertisements.

You can configure your browser to refuse or delete cookies, but this may affect certain website functionalities.



Under PIPEDA and other Canadian laws, you have the following rights concerning your personal information:

Access: You can request access to the personal information we hold.
Correction: You have the right to correct inaccurate or incomplete information.
Withdrawal of Consent: You may withdraw your consent for the use of your personal information at any time, subject to legal or contractual obligations.
Deletion: You can request the deletion of your information, subject to legal retention requirements.

To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided below.



Desi Pinnia may transfer your personal information to service providers outside of Canada. In these cases, we ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to maintain a level of protection equivalent to Canadian privacy laws.



We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or to comply with legal developments. Any changes will be posted on our website, and the date of the latest update will be indicated.



If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your personal information, please contact us at:
Email: [info@desipinnia.com](mailto:info@desipinnia.com)

title: About
text: Desi Pinnian is a beloved traditional snack from South Asia, particularly popular in India. These nutrient-dense sweet balls are crafted from roasted and ground sesame seeds, jaggery (or sugar), and sometimes nuts like almonds and pistachios. Known for their unique texture and earthy flavor, Desi Pinnian are often prepared during winter months for their warming properties and energy-boosting benefits. Beyond being a treat, they are celebrated for their cultural significance, frequently featured in festivals, family gatherings, and as a nostalgic reminder of homemade culinary traditions passed through generations.

title: Code of Ethics for Desi Pinnia
text:
At Desi Pinnia, we are committed to upholding the highest standards of integrity, quality, and ethical practices in every aspect of our business. Our code of ethics outlines the principles that guide our actions in promoting sustainable practices, preserving cultural heritage, and fostering respect within our communities.
1. Compliance with Laws and Regulations
We comply with all applicable local, regional, and international laws, including those related to food safety, labor practices, and fair business operations. Employees and partners are expected to be aware of relevant regulations and ensure their actions reflect legal requirements.


Desi Pinnia is committed to reducing our environmental footprint by implementing sustainable practices in our production processes. We prioritize eco-friendly practices and aim to adopt proactive measures that help protect the environment.
Key Principles:

Promote sustainable sourcing and waste reduction.
Support renewable energy initiatives.
Comply with environmental regulations at every level.




We prioritize transparency and integrity in all our business interactions. Employees, partners, and stakeholders are expected to act ethically and make decisions that reflect the core values of honesty, responsibility, and fairness.
Key Principles:

Avoid conflicts of interest and disclose any potential conflicts.
Provide accurate, complete, and honest information in all communications.
Safeguard confidential information related to the company and clients.




We embrace diversity and strive to create an inclusive environment where every individual is treated with respect and dignity. Discrimination or harassment in any form is strictly prohibited.
Key Principles:

Promote equal opportunity and fairness in hiring and advancement.
Maintain a respectful and harassment-free workplace.
Foster a culture of open communication and mutual respect.




Desi Pinnia is dedicated to ensuring a safe and healthy environment for all employees. We adhere to industry safety standards and continuously work to improve workplace safety.
Key Principles:

Identify and manage workplace hazards.
Provide employees with necessary safety training and resources.
Encourage the reporting of unsafe conditions without fear of retaliation.




We strive to be a positive force in the communities we serve, supporting initiatives that improve the well-being of individuals and promote social good.
Key Principles:

Engage in community development and sustainability projects.
Encourage volunteerism and community involvement.
Partner with organizations that share our social and environmental goals.




Desi Pinnia operates with a strict no-tolerance policy towards bribery and corruption. We comply with all anti-corruption laws and expect our employees and partners to uphold ethical standards.
Key Principles:

Avoid any activities that could be perceived as unethical or corrupt.
Report any instances of bribery or misconduct.
Ensure third-party relationships adhere to ethical standards.




We are committed to strong governance and accountability practices. Our leadership ensures transparency and responsible decision-making at all levels of the company.
Key Principles:

Ensure financial integrity and accurate reporting.
Implement internal controls to prevent and detect fraud.
Uphold fiduciary responsibilities to stakeholders, including clients and employees.




We respect the privacy of our clients, employees, and partners, ensuring that all personal and business information is protected and used appropriately.
Key Principles:

Safeguard personal and business data from unauthorized access.
Use personal information responsibly and in accordance with privacy laws.
Maintain compliance with data protection regulations.




Desi Pinnia encourages employees to report any violations of this Code of Ethics or other legal requirements. We provide confidential channels for reporting and ensure that no employee will face retaliation for reporting in good faith.
Key Principles:

Encourage the reporting of ethical concerns or violations.
Investigate all reports thoroughly and fairly.
Ensure anonymity and protection for whistleblowers.

title: Desi Pinnia Terms of Service
text:
Effective Date: [December, 2024]
Welcome to Desi Pinnia. These Terms of Service (“Terms”) govern your use of our website and services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to comply with these Terms. If you do not agree, please refrain from using our services.


By accessing and using our website or services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms. This agreement is governed by the laws of Canada, particularly the Canadian Consumer Protection Law and the Personal Information Protection and Electronic Documents Act (PIPEDA).



You must be at least 18 years old or have reached the age of majority in your province or territory of residence to use our services. By using the site, you represent that you meet this requirement.



Desi Pinnia reserves the right to modify these Terms at any time. Any changes will be effective upon posting the updated Terms on our website. It is your responsibility to review these Terms periodically. Continued use of the site after such modifications constitutes acceptance of the changes.





You may use our website and services for lawful purposes only. You agree not to:

Engage in unlawful activities or use the services for fraudulent purposes.
Violate any local, provincial, or federal laws or regulations.
Reproduce, distribute, or use any content or intellectual property from our site without prior permission.




You agree not to:

Upload or transmit harmful, disruptive, or malicious code (e.g., viruses).
Interfere with the functionality or security of the site or attempt to gain unauthorized access.
Harass, abuse, or harm others through your interactions on our platform.





All content on the Desi Pinnia website, including text, graphics, logos, and software, is the intellectual property of Desi Pinnia or its licensors. You may not reproduce, distribute, modify, or use this content for commercial purposes without prior written permission.



Your use of our services is subject to our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated by reference into these Terms. By using our services, you agree to the collection, use, and sharing of your information as described in our Privacy Policy, in accordance with Canadian privacy laws.



Our services may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not owned or controlled by Desi Pinnia. We are not responsible for the content, privacy policies, or practices of these third-party services. You access these services at your own risk.





Desi Pinnia provides its services on an “as-is” and “as-available” basis, without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not guarantee that the website or services will be error-free, secure, or uninterrupted, nor do we make any warranties regarding the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of any content.



To the fullest extent permitted by law, Desi Pinnia shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or related to your use of the website or services. This includes damages for loss of profits, data, or other intangible losses.



You agree to indemnify and hold Desi Pinnia harmless from any claims, damages, or expenses arising from your use of the website or services, your violation of these Terms, or your infringement of any rights of another party.




Desi Pinnia reserves the right to terminate or suspend your access to our services at any time, for any reason, including if you violate these Terms or engage in prohibited conduct. Upon termination, you must cease all use of our services and destroy any copies of materials obtained through the site.



These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Canada and the applicable laws of your province or territory of residence. Any disputes arising out of these Terms or your use of the services shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located in Canada.



If any provision of these Terms is found to be invalid or unenforceable by a court of competent jurisdiction, the remaining provisions will remain in full force and effect.



If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms or our services, please contact us at:
Email: info@desipinnia.com
